welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Star, a charming city known for its small-town feel and warm hospitality. We invite you to immerse yourself in our unique culture and explore all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Boise Air Terminal/Gowen Field Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Boise Air Terminal/Gowen Field Airport serves domestic flights operated by major airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Boise Air Terminal/Gowen Field Airport serves domestic flights operated by regional airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport terminal.
